title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.4 - Podiatry fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.4 - Podiatry fee schedule

State Regulations

The fee schedule for podiatry treatment and care rendered
under the Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law shall be the schedule of fees for
podiatry treatment and care under the Workers' Compensation Law of the State of

New York, as set forth in sections
343.1
and
343.2
of this Title, on the date
on which the podiatry services were rendered, regardless of the date of
accident. This podiatry fee schedule is applicable in accordance with the
provisions of section
343.1
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
401.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
